basicInfo.name: Pascal
basicInfo.flavor: After the unification of Aisha, Pascal elected Four Lords to watch over the land. There are rumors that he changed after meeting Bai Jiao.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Divine Authority
Skill 1.desc:
Self
 - Resets the cooldown of [Titan of Calamities].
 - Grants All Damage Nullification. [Ends After: Taking 1 Hit(s)]
 - Grants All Damage Nullification. [Ends After: Taking 2 Hit(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Stacks: All Damage Nullification ends after taking 2 hit(s).
超越2段階達成効果
 - Reduces Cooldown: To 40s.

Skill 2.name: Titan of Calamities
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 390% of Magic Attack 1 time(s). [Additional 50% Crit Rate]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 470% of Magic Attack.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Increases Effect: Crit Rate to 100%.

Passive.name: Gate to the Abyss
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Magic Attack Boost. [Always Active].
 - Grants Crit Damage Boost. [Always Active]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Magic Attack Boost to 33%.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Silvesta, Rin, mother, perfection, power, the Power of Destruction, lamb meat, babaocai, wine, schemes, meticulousness, completeness, Go, Janggi
profile.dislikes: Imperfect things, Dellons, noodles, giving up, distractions, betrayal, variety, rabbits
profile.story: After Pascal found the Stone of Destruction that was wreaking havoc on the world, he and Silvesta set out to seal it away.

basicInfo.name: Pascal
basicInfo.flavor: Pascal bears of one of the five Fragments of Destruction that fell on the continent of Aisha. He rallied the forces to end the Age of War, destroying all of the Shards of Destruction that started it all.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Divine Authority
Skill 1.desc:
Self
 - Resets the cooldown of [Titan of Calamities].
 - Grants All Damage Nullification. [Ends After: Taking 1 Hit(s)]

Skill 2.name: Titan of Calamities
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 350% of Magic Attack 1 time(s). [Additional 50% Crit Rate]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Crit Rate Boost to 50%.

Passive.name: Gate to the Abyss
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Magic Attack Boost. [Always Active].
 - Grants Crit Damage Boost. [Always Active]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Crit Damage Boost to 31%.
